title: Sky-High Central Java Elegance with Rooftop Bar, Daily Breakfast & Sky Lounge Access
description: Towering high above the hustle and bustle of Central Java, revel in tranquility at this five-star urban oasis in Solo, offering phenomenal vistas of the glittering skyline. Stylish and elegant, Alila Solo features a sparkling outdoor rooftop pool with cosy sun loungers, lavish rooms and suites and a luxe wellness-led spa designed for ultimate relaxation. Feel on top of the world, with a drink in your hand at the famous 29th-floor rooftop bar, Agra, gain access to the Sky Lounge and delight your tastebuds with Javan and Western farm-to-table delicacies at the hotel's two restaurants. Embrace the Alila philosophy and explore the vibrant local markets, magnificent royal palaces and historic temples, all a short stroll away.
offer_address: Jl. Slamet Riyadi 562, Solo, Surakarta, Jawa Tengah 57144, Indonesia
